body_html:
@F3PiX

AFAIK you can't DO anything with the filtered students in the students/info screen, can you? What do you have to do with the filter results in order to actually emailing them?

You probably mean users/info, right? You can't do anything directly in the Teams App. What we would do is: a) copy email addresses to send emails from HelpScout (small groups, e.g. accepted teams); b) copy email addresses to send emails from MailChimp (large groups, e.g. all students who applied in the current season); c) copy/print addresses to send swag (accepted teams); d) copy a view and paste into a google spreadsheet for any other purposes.

Wouldn't it make more sense to add the filter to the Mailer view (or even the Exporters)?

We can make an export (or multiple exports) for this, of course. But then the users/info page will stay useless.
What is the Mailer view?
